content.p: Competitive funding opportunities based on a range of factors, such as financial need, academic potential or non-academic skills Students who show outstanding achievement can be rewarded with financial support during their studies through a scholarship. Scholarships are non-repayable in most cases; however, they are competitive due to limited availability. Students can apply for the scholarship of their choice and applicants are assessed based on how closely they fit the criteria. We have a range of scholarships available for those with different skills, abilities and backgrounds. Explore the scholarships below to find one that’s right for you. Funding for students from lower income backgrounds Faculty-specific scholarships funded by alumni For students with an entrepreneurial spirit Academy, national or international sportspeople For academic students with personal barriers Competitive scholarships based on your subject For students from around the East Midlands Scholarships for those seeking or granted asylum For students with a strong academic ability Supporting students to discover innovative ideas For students who travel or study abroad For students studying insurance related subjects If you don’t meet the criteria for these scholarships or are unsuccessful in your application, you may still be eligible to receive a bursary. Some of our bursaries have unlimited availability, so you are guaranteed to receive funding if you meet the eligibility criteria. If you’re looking for more information, please head to our help and support hub, where you can find frequently asked questions or details of how to make an enquiry.
